author: WADA(West Africa Decentralized Alliance)
title: WADA +GL +Metadata = Donor Rewards+
description: There is currently no framework to reward and trace donations on the blockchain using metadata.
solution: Use the Friends of WADA First 50 Donor Reward Program for metadata curriculum dev't & to design a fund-tracing and accountability framework
experience: GimbaLabs (GL) (Training) +Cardano Pool XYZ(Stakepool Experience)+ Proof of Africa/ABCD(train the trainer devs) +WADA (trainee devs)
